snippet.title: Soulmask Official Trailer 02- Build Your Own Tribe
snippet.description:
steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2646460/Soulmask/
discord: https://discord.gg/eVsURRrKU3
There are three major tribes in Soulmask - FLINT, FANG and CLAW. Can you survive against threats of these tribes with your tribesmen? Try out the demo to find out the answer during Steam Next Fest(5th, Feb~ 18th, Feb)! The demo has included the single-player mode with no limit time in game!
